text.section: The provisions of this section apply in Harford County only.

section.section:
A licensee may sell, offer for sale, or dispense alcoholic beverages:
On Monday through Sunday; and
Only between 8 a.m. and 2 a.m. the following morning.

A Class B Cafe licensee may offer to sell beer and wine:
On Monday through Saturday from 10 a.m. to 11 p.m.; and
On Sunday from 10 a.m. to 11 p.m.

During a baseball game only, a licensee who holds a stadium on-sale license under § 8-213.1 of this article may not sell alcoholic beverages:
After the beginning of the eighth inning; or
During a doubleheader game, after the beginning of the sixth inning of the second game.

text.section:
A licensee may not:
Allow alcoholic beverages to be consumed on the licensee's premises after 2:15 a.m. or before 8:00 a.m. the same morning; or
Allow alcoholic beverages glasses, bottles, or containers to remain on tables or serving counters after 2:30 a.m.
